entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
